front.title: Mobile IPv4 Traversal Across IPsec-based VPN Gateways

abstract.t: This document outlines the proposed solution for the Mobile IPv4 andIPsec coexistence problem for enterprise users. The solution consistsof an applicability statement for using Mobile IPv4 and IPsec forsession mobility in corporate remote access scenarios, and a requiredmechanism for detecting the trusted internal network securely. Thesolution requires only changes to the mobile node; changes to MobileIPv4 or IPsec are not required.
